title: User Authentication & Authorization
description: Implement a secure user authentication and authorization system to manage user access to the backend.
acceptance_criteria: Control access to specific features or data
Create different user roles with varying permissions
The authentication system should be secure, using industry-standard practices.
The authorization system should be flexible, allowing for fine-grained control over access permissions.
The system should be well-documented and easy to understand.

recommendations: Add the necessary modules for user authentication and authorization (e.g., Passport, JWT).
Create a new module for authentication and authorization.
Implement user registration, login, and logout endpoints.
Create middleware for authorization and authentication.
Implement logic for user registration, login, and logout.
Define endpoints for user registration, login, and logout.
Implement user management functionality, including user creation, updating, and deletion.
Add authorization middleware to restrict access to specific endpoints based on user roles.
Add authorization middleware to restrict access to specific endpoints based on user roles.
